duties_responsibilities.duty: Making multiple cold calls per day, in person and over the phone.
Learning and knowing the suite of solutions inside and out.
Working in the custom CRM to manage follow-ups with prospects.
Staying extremely organized with prospects in each step of the sales cycle.
Following the sales process from introduction to implementation.
Ensuring all the information needed by internal teams for client success is communicated.
Taking care of clients after the sale and maintaining strong communication.
